fields.summary: RM web UI: app page will crash if app is failed before any attempt has been created

fields.description: An RM (running in a VM which did a sleep/resume) overnight no longer launches apps, and when you try to look at the logs, Web UI says "500 look at the logs", which show a stack trace

comments.body:
{code}

2015-01-14 14:26:16,053 INFO  logs (Slf4jLog.java:info(67)) - Aliases are enabled
{code}

in the source {{    RMAppAttemptMetrics attemptMetrics =
        rmApp.getCurrentAppAttempt().getRMAppAttemptMetrics();}}

clearly the app failed *before any app attempt was created*

The root cause looks like some token renewal thing probably caused by the VM save/resume, related to kerberos renewal by the look of things

{code}

I plan to fix all that by restarting the VM...the NPE in the web view is something that could reoccur in similar circumstances
you're right. closing as a duplicate
Closing old tickets that are already part of a release.
